attributes.action: No to founding of Jewish Schools in Borehamwood. Multi faith schools in Boreham Wood need the money more
attributes.additional_details:
The Jewish Community in Boreham Wood are asking for founding for a Jewish primary school in Boreham Wood

We need to think of the Many more children Boreham Wood that have to suffer class over crowding and low ofsted marks. How could funding a secular school in this environment be a good thing? There is already a high level of tension in the local area and this would only inflame tensions.

Please do not let this happen and sign this before passing it to everyone you know it does not matter if they are from Boreham wood.
